item.title: Marsha Sharp
item.itunes:author: College of Media & Communication TTU Graduate Program
item.itunes:summary: Associate Athletics Director and Head Coach Emerita, Marsha Sharp, stepped into the podcast booth with Harper Anderson (Texas Tech CoMC Ph.D. student) on May 10, 2016, and talked about leadership, the Fearless Champions program, and her personal journey in womenâ€™s basketball and in west Texas. This is our first episode of the Coffee Pod, Stories in Sports series.
item.itunes:keywords: Marsha Sharp, sports, comc, leadership, journey, basketball, coffee, TTU, women, women's basketball, college basketball
